name: Gourmet Chef Salad Platter
description: Roast beef, turkey, ham and American cheese on a bed of mix lettuce with tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, olives and boiled egg.

name: Chicken Fajita Wrap
description: Char-broiled chicken breast, oven roast pepper, caramelized onions and cheddar cheese with salsa.

name: Meatless Panini
description: Fresh mozzarella, fresh plum tomatoes, fresh basil, fresh spinach and fresh sun-dried tomatoes spread on a European flatbread.

name: Italian Philly
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, pepper and onion.

name: Greek Salad Platter
description: Feta cheese on a bed of lettuce with tomato, red onions, black olives, grape leaves and boiled egg.

name: Cuban Panini
description: Roasted pork, ham, Swiss cheese, pickles and mustard on a European flatbread.

name: Turkey Burger Deluxe
description: French fries and lettuce, tomato, onion and pickle.
